SELECT distinct r.id,r.role_name,r.role_code,r.level,r.tenant_default_role,r.project_default_role, r.system_default_role FROM user u inner JOIN user_role_project urp ON u.id = #{userId} AND urp.project_id = #{projectId} and u.id = urp.user_id and u.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = urp.role_id AND r.del_flag = 0

SELECT distinct r.id,r.role_name,r.role_code,r.level,r.tenant_default_role,r.project_default_role, r.system_default_role, r.inherit_id FROM role r inner JOIN user_role_project urp ON urp.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and r.id = urp.role_id AND r.del_flag = 0 inner JOIN user u ON u.id = #{userId} and u.id = urp.user_id and u.del_flag = 0 order by r.inherit_id

SELECT distinct r.id,r.role_name,r.role_code,r.level,r.tenant_default_role,r.project_default_role, r.system_default_role, r.inherit_id FROM role r inner JOIN user_role_project urp ON r.id = urp.role_id AND r.del_flag = 0 inner JOIN project p on p.id = urp.project_id and p.tenant_id=#{tenantId} and p.del_flag=0 inner JOIN user u ON u.id = #{userId} and u.id = urp.user_id and u.del_flag = 0 order by r.inherit_id
